text.div:
Supported Service Types

This value set defines subset of codes of service-types.

This value set is a subset of codes from the following code systems:

  • Include subset of the CPT codes defined in https://coder.aapc.com/cpt-codes/
  • Include subset of the HCPCS codes defined in https://coder.aapc.com/hcpcs-codes/

This is a subset of service types value set of CPT-4, HCPCS Codes and may be updated later.

Code Display
S9482 Family stabilization services, per 15 minutes
S0221 Medical conference by a physician with interdisciplinary team of health professionals or representatives of community agencies to coordinate activities of patient care (patient is present); approximately 60 minutes
T1006 Hospice evaluation and counseling services, pre-election
H0006 Alcohol and/or drug services; case management
H0025 Behavioral health prevention education service (delivery of services with target population to affect knowledge, attitude and/or behavior)
H0035 Mental health partial hospitalization, treatment, less than 24 hours

name: Service Type codes that can be used to define services performed
description: This value set defines subset of codes for service-types.
